definition: Mt Wu on the Changjiang River (Yangtze) by the Three Gorges
Wushan county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
surname Wu/also pr. [Wu2]
witch/wizard/shaman/also pr. [wu2]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Wushan county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
there are no rivers to one who has crossed the ocean, and no clouds to one who has passed Mount Wu (idiom)/one who has seen the world doesn't stop at small things
pinyin: ceng2 jing1 cang1 hai3 nan2 wei2 shui3 , chu2 que4 Wu1 Shan1 bu4 shi4 yun2
containing_words.word: 曾經滄海難為水，除卻巫山不是雲

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the chemical components in the volatile oil from the leaf of Epimedium wushanense T.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巫山淫羊藿葉中揮發油的化學成分。

sentences.english: The most marvelous scene here is the twelve mountains peaks and, in particular, Goddess mountain peak.
sentences.chinese: 景色最妙要數巫山十二峯，而猶以神女峯獨具神韻。

sentences.english: High in the mountains surrounded by Hashimura from Wushan County, nearly 3 hours.
sentences.chinese: 高橋村處在大山環抱中，距巫山縣城有近3小時車程。

sentences.english: It seems you like Wushan Wushan been to it?
sentences.chinese: 看來你很喜歡巫山，去過巫山嗎？

sentences.english: It seems you like Wushan Wushan been to it?
sentences.chinese: 看來你很喜歡巫山，去過巫山嗎？

sentences.english: You You read my mind without Wushan Yanyun.
sentences.chinese: 幽幽我心無念巫山煙雲。

sentences.english: Wushan culture constitutes the main body of the Three Gorges culture.
sentences.chinese: 巫山文化是三峽文化的核心。

sentences.english: Do not have time to continue up to enjoy the beautiful deep in Wushan.
sentences.chinese: 所沒有時間就仍然繼續上行，去領略巫山的幽深秀麗。
